doc:
Dwight Schultz https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dwight_Schultz 0 William Dwight Schultz (born November 24, 1947) is an American actor and voice artist. He is known for his roles as Captain "Howling Mad" Murdock on the 1980s action series The A-Team, and as Reginald Barclay in Star Trek: The Next Generation, Star Trek: Voyager and the film Star Trek: First Contact. He is also known in animation as the mad scientist Dr. Animo in the Ben 10 series, Chef Mung Daal in the children's cartoon Chowder, and Eddie the Squirrel in CatDog. William_Dwight_Schultz ( born November_24 , 1947 ) is an_American_actor_and_voice_artist . He is_known for his_roles as Captain " Howling_Mad_"_Murdock on the_1980s_action_series The_A-Team , and as Reginald_Barclay in Star_Trek : The_Next_Generation , Star_Trek : Voyager and the_film_Star_Trek : First_Contact . He is_also_known in animation as the_mad_scientist_Dr._Animo in the_Ben_10_series_,_Chef_Mung_Daal in the_children 's_cartoon_Chowder , and Eddie the_Squirrel in CatDog .
